actions.name: Hammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Heat Metal
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature wearing or holding a metal object. Hit: 9 (2d8) fire damage. If a creature is holding the object and suffers damage  it makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw  dropping the object on a failure.

bonus_actions.name: Fire Step
bonus_actions.desc: While standing in fire, the azer can magically teleport up to 90 feet to a space within fire.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Aura
special_abilities.desc: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of one or more azers takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
